attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Sets whether the button is disabled.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: native-type
attrs.desc: Set the form type of the button and image buttons. This attribute is used only when type is set to button or image. ;Native type attribute; The options of this attribute are button / submit / reset
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is button.

attrs.name: reset-time
attrs.desc: Set the button disable time, in milliseconds, to prevent repeated submission.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 1000.

attrs.name: text
attrs.desc: Sets the text displayed on the button. The text can be internationalized.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Define the button size. The value of this attribute can be large, medium, small, or mini

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Displays different button states. The optional values of this attribute are primary / success / warning / danger / info / text

attrs.name: plain
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: round
attrs.desc: Whether to round the corner button
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: circle
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: loading
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: autofocus
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

events.name: click
events.desc: Sets the callback function triggered when a button is clicked.
